para.para: this class discribes the datastructure of a message This class contains the type of a message ATTENTION: this type is not runnable!!!! -> contains the Constructor get Data from farams in Relation message := {type:int, Date:String, Time:String, Content:String, userId:int, isDelted:boolean} -> also contains getter methods for all attributes
